bills.title: Allows commercial property owner to claim tax credit against CBT or GIT for providing commercial tenant rent forgiveness during COVID-19 emergency.
bills.last_action: Introduced in the Senate, Referred to Senate Budget and Appropriations Committee

bills.title: Establishes certain requirements concerning State's preparedness and response to infectious disease outbreaks, including coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) pandemic.

Provides for certain criminal and civil justice reforms, particularly with respect to legal consequences associated with certain marijuana and hashish offences as well as broadening awareness of available expungement relief.*
Requires in person early voting period for certain elections; makes appropriation.
bills.last_action: Introduced in the Senate, Referred to Senate State Government, Wagering, Tourism & Historic Preservation Committee

bills.title: Expands eligibility criteria for municipalities wherein projects receiving New Jersey Redevelopment Authority assistance may occur.
bills.last_action: Referred to Senate Budget and Appropriations Committee
